transactionId.title: The transaction ID uniquely identifies this specific buy data extract.
transactionId.description: The transaction ID uniquely identifies the extract and must be returned as part of the allocation instructions.

clientCode.title: The client's identifier within SpectraOX
clientCode.description: The client identifier helps the allocation tool link schedule data to goal data

clientName.title: The client's name within SpectraOX
clientName.description: The long client name helps the allocation system inform the user within that system.

estimateCode.title: The estimate code from the SpectraOX system
estimateCode.description: The estimate code is used by the buyers and is found in goal data, but is part of a compound key. The code itself is not unique.

estimateNumber.title: The surrogate key for an estimate in SpectraOX
estimateNumber.description: The estimate number, unlike the estimate code, is a unique identifer for a given estimate record in SpectraOX

demoCount.title: The number of elements that will be found in each estDemo array
demoCount.description: The number of elements that will be found in each estDemo array

extractRecordCount.title: The length of the buys array
extractRecordCount.description: The length of the buys array

buyNumber.title: The buyNumber is the surrogate key for each unit.
buyNumber.description: The buyNumber is the surrogate key for each unit.

updateInvalidReason.title: The update invalid reason, when non-blank, notes that a given unit must not be changed in the returned allocation.
updateInvalidReason.description: The update invalid reason, when non-blank, notes that a given unit must not be changed in the returned allocation. Allocation instructions to change an unit described as having an update invalid reason will result in all transactions failing and/or rolled back.

daypartCode.title: The daypart code assigned to the unit.
daypartCode.description: The daypart code assigned to the unit. This data helps determine the correct goal data for the allocation exercise. All units within a given extract must have the same daypart code throughout.

networkCode.title: The SpectraOX code of the network
networkCode.description: The SpectraOX code of the network

networkName.title: The name of the network in SpectraOX
networkName.description: The name of the network in SpectraOX

programName.title: The program name in SpectraOX
programName.description: The program name in SpectraOX, entered for the buy unit

brandCode.title: The current brand assignment within SpectraOX for this unit.
brandCode.description: The current brand assignment within SpectraOX for this unit. If the buy is unallocated, the code will be an empty string.

brandName.title: The brand name for the currently allocated brand for this unit.
brandName.description: The brand name for the currently allocated brand for this unit. If the buy is unallocated, the code will be an empty string

programStartTime.title: The start time of the program/rotation for this unit.
programStartTime.description: The start time of the program/rotation for this unit

programEndTime.title: The end time of the program/rotation for this unit.
programEndTime.description: The end time of the program/rotation for this unit

programDays.title: The possible days of the week in the rotation purchased for this unit.
programDays.description: The possible days of the week in the rotation purchased for this unit.

airDate.title: Air date, or the first possible date this unit may air.
airDate.description: The air date as entered in SpectraOX. The expected format for dates here is YYYYMMDD

unitLength.title: The number of seconds within this purchased unit
unitLength.description: The number of seconds within this purchased unit

timeCost.title: The current time cost for this unit
timeCost.description: The current time cost for this unit

estDemos.title: The list of demographic estimates for this unit
estDemos.description: The list of demographic estimates for this unit

demoType.title: The demographic modifier for this demo from the inbound schedule data.
demoType.description: The demographic modifier distinguishes differences in ethnicity and/or Nielsen ratings products/streams

demoCode.title: The demographic (i.e. sex and age range) estimate for the new unit.
demoCode.description: The demographic (i.e. sex and age range) estimate for the new unit.

estRtgData.title: The numeric rating for the new unit.

estImpData.title: The numeric rating for the new unit.
